Track piglet growth metrics (weight, height, etc.)
flows: Farm staff navigates to Piglet Management section.
Farm staff selects a specific piglet.
Farm staff views/edits growth metrics (weight, height, etc.).
System saves updated growth metrics.
screens: Piglet Details Screen (with Growth Metrics tab/section)

correspondingFeature: Track piglet growth metrics (weight, height, etc.)
flows: API endpoint to save piglet growth metrics.
Database schema update to store growth metrics.
Data validation logic for growth metrics.

correspondingFeature: Track piglet growth metrics (weight, height, etc.)
flows: Test saving valid growth metrics.
Test saving invalid growth metrics (e.g., negative weight).
Test retrieving and displaying growth metrics.
Farm staff navigates to Piglet Management section.
Farm staff selects a specific piglet.
Farm staff views/creates/edits feeding schedules.
System saves updated feeding schedules.
screens: Piglet Details Screen (with Feeding Schedule tab/section)

flows: API endpoint to save piglet feeding schedules.
Database schema update to store feeding schedules.
Logic to handle recurring feeding schedules.
Test creating, editing, and deleting feeding schedules.
Test recurring feeding schedules.
Test displaying feeding schedules.
screens: Piglet Details Screen (verify displayed feeding schedule data)

taskName: Design Temperature and Environmental Condition Monitoring
flows: Farm staff navigates to Piglet Management section.
Farm staff selects a specific piglet or group of piglets.
Farm staff views temperature and environmental conditions (e.g., humidity).
System displays historical data and alerts for out-of-range conditions.

taskName: Implement Temperature and Environmental Condition Monitoring
flows: API endpoint to receive temperature and environmental data (from sensors or manual input).
Database schema to store environmental data.
Alerting system for out-of-range conditions.
Data aggregation and charting logic.

taskName: Test Temperature and Environmental Condition Monitoring
flows: Test receiving and storing valid environmental data.
Test handling missing or invalid data.
Test alerting system.
Test displaying historical data.
screens: Piglet Details Screen (verify displayed environmental data)

flows: Farm staff navigates to Piglet Management section.
Farm staff creates/edits piglet breeds.

System filters and displays piglets by breed.

screens: Piglet Details Screen (verify displayed disease and treatment data)
